text: Brixton tube station, a station on the London Underground opened on 23 July 1971, is the southern terminus of the Victoria Line. Brixton used to be the most Southern stop of the Northern line until 1996 when it switched to the Victoria line. ==Related pages== *List of London Underground stations ==References== ==Other websites== * *Brixton tube station at urban75.org Category:Victoria line stations Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Lambeth Category:Brixton Category:London Travelcard zone 2
title: Brixton tube station
